menu.title: The “Fitness” menu
menu.descr: The “Fitness” menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. For people who interested in sports; active and healthy. It's absolutely a new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: The “Lean” menu
menu.descr: The “Lean” menu  is a careful selection ingredients: complete absence of animal products origin. Complete harmony with yourself and nature in every element!

menu.title: The “Premium” menu
menu.descr: The “Premium” menu - we use not only a beautiful design packaging, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruit - restaurant menu without going to restaurant!
